sourcesContent:
<v-ons-tabbar>
  <template slot="pages">
    <home-page></home-page>
    <news-page></news-page>
    <settings-page></settings-page>
  </template>
  
  <v-ons-tab v-for="(tab, i) in tabs"
    :icon="tabs[i].icon"
    :label="tabs[i].label"
    :badge="tabs[i].badge"
    ></v-ons-tab>

</v-ons-tabbar>

<script>
// import AppHeader from './components/layout/AppHeader.vue'

import HomeThat from './views/HomeThat'
export default {
    
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    // AppHeader
  },
  data() {
	return {
    	tabs: [
        	{
            	icon: '', // icon image src
                label:'HomeThat', // text label
                badge: 0  // badge number(count)
            }
        ]
    }
}
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}
</style>
